Kaye, 2015: shows the efficacy of epidural injections in managing a multitude of chronic spinal conditions.
Manchikanti , 2015: significant improvement … with local anesthetic only, or with steroids in a long-term follow-up of up to 2 year'
Cochrane (Ammendolia), 2013: injections improve pain, function, and quality of life, up to two weeks'
